starfleet_message: A distress call has been received from a Federation science station orbiting Epsilon IV.
mission_description: Investigate the distress call and ensure the safety of the science team.

dialogue_tree.line: Captain, the science station is not responding to hails.

options.label: Continue trying to hail Commander.
Scan for life sign, Mr. Data.
options.crew_reply: Scans show no life signs sir.'

options.label: Number One, Data, Worf, You're with me.

options.crew_reply: Riker: 'Plan committed and routed to departments.'

Stand down to condition green at Epsilon IV
